1. Here are some of the newest UNESCO World Heritage sites  NPR
  2. Yen Tu-Vinh Nghiem-Con Son, Kiep Bac Complex of Monuments and Landscapes  UNESCO World Heritage Centre
  3. From French Stonehenge to Fairytale Castles, These 32 Sites Just Earned World Heritage Status  Artnet News
  4. The original ‘Disney castle’ finally named as Unesco World Heritage Site  The Independent
  5. These 26 Sites Were Just Added to the UNESCO World Heritage List  Condé Nast Traveler
